original: Theravāda Vinaya
analyzed: thera vāda vinaya

original: Mahāvibhaṅga
analyzed: mahāvibhaṅga

original: Pācittiyakaṇḍa
analyzed: pācittiyakaṇḍa

original: Bhūtagāmavagga
analyzed: bhūta gāma vagga

original: 12. Aññavādakasikkhāpada
analyzed: aññavādaka sikkhāpada

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā kosambiyam viharati ghosita ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo anācāraṁ ācaritvā saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati—
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena āyasmā channaḥ anācāram ācaritvā saṅgha majjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamānaḥ aññena aññam paṭicarati

original: “ko āpanno, kiṁ āpanno, kismiṁ āpanno, kathaṁ āpanno, kaṁ bhaṇatha, kiṁ bhaṇathā”ti?
analyzed: kaḥ āpannaḥ kim āpannaḥ kismin āpannaḥ katham āpannaḥ kam bhaṇatha kim bhaṇatha ati

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicarissati—
analyzed: katham hi nāma āyasmā channaḥ saṅgha majjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamānaḥ aññena aññam paṭicarissati

original: ‘ko āpanno, kiṁ āpanno, kismiṁ āpanno, kathaṁ āpanno, kaṁ bhaṇatha, kiṁ bhaṇathā’”ti …pe…
analyzed: kaḥ āpannaḥ kim āpannaḥ kismin āpannaḥ katham āpannaḥ kam bhaṇatha kim bhaṇatha ati pe

original: saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, channa, saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicarasi—
analyzed: saccam kira tva channa saṅgha majjhe āpattiyai anuyuñjīyamānaḥ aññena aññam paṭicarasi

original: ‘ko āpanno, kiṁ āpanno, kismiṁ āpanno, kathaṁ āpanno, kaṁ bhaṇatha, kiṁ bhaṇathā’”ti?
analyzed: kaḥ āpannaḥ kim āpannaḥ kismin āpannaḥ katham āpannaḥ kam bhaṇatha kim bhaṇatha ati

original: “Saccaṁ, bhagavā”ti.
analyzed: sat ca bhagavān ati

original: Vigarahi buddho bhagavā …pe…
analyzed: vigarahi buddhaḥ bhagavān pe

original: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicarissasi—
analyzed: katham hi nāma tva mogha purisa saṅgha majjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamānaḥ aññena aññam paṭicarissasi

original: “ko āpanno, kiṁ āpanno, kismiṁ āpanno, kathaṁ āpanno, kaṁ bhaṇatha, kiṁ bhaṇathā”ti.
analyzed: kaḥ āpannaḥ kim āpannaḥ kismin āpannaḥ katham āpannaḥ kam bhaṇatha kim bhaṇatha ati

original: Netaṁ, moghapurisa, appasannānaṁ vā pasādāya …pe…
analyzed: neta moghapurisa appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: vigarahitvā …pe…
analyzed: vigara hitvā pe

original: dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno aññavādakaṁ ropetu.
analyzed: tena hi bhikkhave saṅghaḥ channassa bhikkhuno añña vādakam ropetu

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, ropetabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave ropetabba

original: Byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
analyzed: byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅghaḥ ñāpetabbaḥ

original: ‘Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho.
analyzed: suṇātu me bhante saṅghaḥ

original: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati.
analyzed: ayam channaḥ bhikkhu saṅgha majjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamānaḥ aññena aññam paṭicarati

original: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno aññavādakaṁ ropeyya.
analyzed: yadi saṅghassa pattakalla saṅghaḥ channassa bhikkhuno aññavādakam ropeyya

original: Esā ñatti.
analyzed: esā ñatti

original: Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho.
analyzed: suṇātu me bhante saṅghaḥ

original: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati.
analyzed: ayam channaḥ bhikkhu saṅgha majjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamānaḥ aññena aññam paṭicarati

original: Saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno aññavādakaṁ ropeti.
analyzed: saṅghaḥ channassa bhikkhuno añña vādakam ropeti

original: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno aññavādakassa ropanā, so tuṇhassa;
analyzed: yassa ayasmataḥ khamati channassa bhikkhuno añña vādakassa ropanā saḥ tuṇhassa

original: yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.
analyzed: yassa na khamati saḥ bhāseyya

original: Ropitaṁ saṅghena channassa bhikkhuno aññavādakaṁ.
analyzed: ropitam saṅghena channassa bhikkhuno añña vādaka

original: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
analyzed: khamati saṅghassa tasmai tuṇhī evam etam dhārayāmi iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ channaṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān āyasmantam channam aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Aññavādake pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: añña vādake pācittiyanti

analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicaranto—
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channaḥ saṅgha majjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamānaḥ aññena aññam paṭicarantaḥ

original: “āpattiṁ āpajjissāmī”ti tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṁ viheseti.
analyzed: āpattim āpajjissāmi iti tuṇhībhūtaḥ saṅgham viheseti

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṁ vihesessatī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma āyasmā channaḥ saṅgha majjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamānaḥ tuṇhībhūtaḥ saṅgham vihesessati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, channa, saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṁ vihesesī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tva channa saṅgha majjhe āpattiyāḥ anuyuñjīyamānaḥ tuṇhībhūtaḥ saṅgham vihesesi iti

original: “Saccaṁ, bhagavā”ti.
analyzed: sat ca bhagavān ati

original: Vigarahi buddho bhagavā …pe…
analyzed: vigarahi buddhaḥ bhagavān pe

analyzed: katham hi nāma tva mogha purisa saṅgha majjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamānaḥ tuṇhībhūtaḥ saṅgham vihesessasi

original: Netaṁ, moghapurisa, appasannānaṁ vā pasādāya …pe…
analyzed: neta moghapurisa appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: vigarahitvā …pe…
analyzed: vigara hitvā pe

original: dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

analyzed: tena hi bhikkhave saṅghaḥ channassa bhikkhuno vihesakam ropetu

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, ropetabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave ropetabba

original: Byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo—
analyzed: byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅghaḥ ñāpetabbaḥ

original: ‘Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho.
analyzed: suṇātu me bhante saṅghaḥ

analyzed: ayam channaḥ bhikkhu saṅgha majjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamānaḥ tuṇhībhūtaḥ saṅgham viheseti

original: Esā ñatti.
analyzed: esā ñatti

original: Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho.
analyzed: suṇātu me bhante saṅghaḥ

analyzed: ayam channaḥ bhikkhu saṅgha majjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamānaḥ tuṇhībhūtaḥ saṅgham viheseti

original: yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya.

original: Ropitaṁ saṅghena channassa bhikkhuno vihesakaṁ.
analyzed: ropitam saṅghena channassa bhikkhuno vihesaka

original: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
analyzed: khamati saṅghassa tasmai tuṇhī evam etam dhārayāmi iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ channaṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Aññavādake vihesake pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: añña vādake vihesake pācittiyanti

original: Aññavādako nāma
analyzed: aññavādakaḥ nāma

original: saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṁ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṁ na kathetukāmo taṁ na ugghāṭetukāmo
analyzed: saṅgha majjhe vatthusmim vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamānaḥ tam na kathetu kāmo tam na ugghāṭetu kāmo

original: aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati— “ko āpanno, kiṁ āpanno, kismiṁ āpanno, kathaṁ āpanno, kaṁ
analyzed: aññena aññam paṭicarati kaḥ āpanno kim āpannaḥ kismin āpannaḥ katham āpannaḥ ka

original: bhaṇatha, kiṁ bhaṇathā”ti. Eso aññavādako nāma.
analyzed: bhaṇatha kim bhaṇatha ati eso aññavādakaḥ nāma

original: Vihesako nāma
analyzed: vihesakaḥ nāma

original: saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṁ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṁ na kathetukāmo taṁ na ugghāṭetukāmo tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṁ viheseti. Eso vihesako nāma.
analyzed: saṅgha majjhe vatthusmim vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamānaḥ tam na kathetu kāmo tam na ugghāṭetu kāmo tuṇhībhūtaḥ saṅgham viheseti esaḥ vihesakaḥ nāma

original: Aropite aññavādake saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṁ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṁ na kathetukāmo taṁ na ugghāṭetukāmo aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati—
analyzed: aropite aññavādake saṅgha majjhe vatthusmim vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno tam na kathetu kāmo tam na ugghāṭetu kāmo aññena aññam paṭicarati

original: “ko āpanno, kiṁ āpanno, kismiṁ āpanno, kathaṁ āpanno, kaṁ bhaṇatha, kiṁ bhaṇathā”ti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: kaḥ āpanno kim āpannaḥ kismin āpannaḥ katham āpannaḥ kam bhaṇatha kim bhaṇatha ati āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Aropite vihesake saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṁ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṁ na kathetukāmo taṁ na ugghāṭetukāmo tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṁ viheseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: a ropite vihesake saṅgha majjhe vatthusmim vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno tam na kathetu kāmo tam na ugghāṭetu kāmo tuṇhībhūtaḥ saṅgham viheseti āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Ropite aññavādake saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṁ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṁ na kathetukāmo taṁ na ugghāṭetukāmo aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati—
analyzed: ropite aññavādake saṅgha majjhe vatthusmim vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno tam na kathetu kāmo tam na ugghāṭetu kāmo aññena aññam paṭicarati

original: “ko āpanno, kiṁ āpanno, kismiṁ āpanno, kathaṁ āpanno, kaṁ bhaṇatha, kiṁ bhaṇathā”ti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: kaḥ āpannaḥ kim āpannaḥ kismin āpannaḥ katham āpannaḥ kam bhaṇatha kim bhaṇatha ati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Ropite vihesake saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṁ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṁ na kathetukāmo taṁ na ugghāṭetukāmo tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṁ viheseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: ropite vihesake saṅgha majjhe vatthusmim vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamānaḥ tam na kathetu kāmo tam na ugghāṭetu kāmo tuṇhībhūtaḥ saṅgham viheseti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī aññavādake vihesake, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: dhamma kamme dhamma kamma saññī aññavādake vihesake āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Dhammakamme vematiko aññavādake vihesake, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: dhamma kamme vematikaḥ aññavādake vihesake āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī aññavādake vihesake, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: dhamma kamme adhamma kamma saññī aññavādake vihesake āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Adhammakamme dhammakammasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: adhamma kamme dhamma kamma saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Adhammakamme vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: adhamma kamme vematikaḥ āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Adhammakamme adhammakammasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: adhamma kamme adhamma kamma saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Anāpatti—
analyzed: anāpatti

original: ajānanto pucchati,
analyzed: a jānantaḥ pucchati

original: gilāno vā na katheti;
analyzed: gilānaḥ vā na kathā iti

original: “saṅghassa bhaṇḍanaṁ vā kalaho vā viggaho vā vivādo vā bhavissatī”ti na katheti;
analyzed: saṅghassa bhaṇḍanam vā kalahaḥ vā viggahaḥ vā vivādaḥ vā bhavissati iti na katheti

original: “saṅghabhedo vā saṅgharāji vā bhavissatī”ti na katheti;
analyzed: saṅgha bhedaḥ vā saṅgha rāji vā bhavissati iti na kathā iti

original: “adhammena vā vaggena vā nakammārahassa vā kammaṁ karissatī”ti na katheti;
analyzed: adhammena vā vaggena vā na kamma arahassa vā kammam karissati iti na katheti

original: ummattakassa,
analyzed: ummattakassa

original: ādikammikassāti.
analyzed: ādikammikassa ati

original: Aññavādakasikkhāpadaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ dutiyaṁ.
analyzed: aññavādaka sikkhāpadam niṭṭhitam dutiya
